dc.title: Congressman Robert C. "Bobby" Scott - Serving Virginia's 3rd Congressional District
dc.description: Congressman Robert C. "Bobby" Scott began serving his eighth term as a member of Congress on January 4, 2007. Prior to serving in the U.S. House of Representatives, Rep. Scott served in the Virginia House of Delegates from 1978 to 1983 and in the Senate of Virginia from 1983 to 1993.
